long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Organise notes about Twitter profiles directly from Twitter.

With the click of a button, you can instantly add notes about people, regardless if you are following them or not. All data is persisted within your Chrome Browser and is not shared with third parties.

Bird Notes Chrome Extension allows you to:
- Save notes about Twitter profiles
- Differentiate profiles with notes in your Twitter feed
